channel.title: [317]-Rune Age 2.0 PK Is Here! Come Take A Look!-[317] NON-DELTA
channel.description:
[center][b]Info[/b][/center] [center]Okay so I put my first server, Rune Age PK, on every status page and I didn't even get [b]1[/b] player! So I changed everything on the server and called it, I don't know, Rune Age 2.0 PK! :eek: So I posted it up on only two server status pages and I got over 35 players! How good is that? You can leech my server and build on it or do whatever the hell you want cause IDC! Anyway I hope you like the server and [b][u]ALSO:[/u][/b] Sorry I can't post any pics because my 'Print Screen SysRq' button won't work. :( I will try to get pics as soon as I can![/center]
[center][b]So here's what the server has to bring you.[/b][/center] [center]Fixed Dupe Fixed bugs glitches All Doors Working Perfect Packet Handlers Full Teleporting (not needed due to PK server) All Magics (use some client with lunar...) Following Shops added ::Pickup and ::Master added Yelling Prayer GS Stances LagHandler And thats pretty much it![/center]
[center]Like I said you can add on to it! Pics will be added later on![/center]
Server Download: [url=http://uppit.com/v/ZVBKEFZ8]http://uppit.com/v/ZVBKEFZ8[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/v/ZVBKEFZ8]http://uppit.com/v/ZVBKEFZ8[/url] No Mirrors Yet. Have fun!
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 27, 2009, 12:57:45 pm[/size][hr]:D

@_xero_123 wrote:

[center]Info[/center]
[center]Okay so I put my first server, Rune Age PK, on every status page and I didn’t even get 1 player! So I changed everything on the server and called it, I don’t know, Rune Age 2.0 PK! :eek: So I posted it up on only two server status pages and I got over 35 players! How good is that? You can leech my server and build on it or do whatever the hell you want cause IDC! Anyway I hope you like the server and ALSO: Sorry I can’t post any pics because my ‘Print Screen SysRq’ button won’t work. I will try to get pics as soon as I can![/center]

[center]So here’s what the server has to bring you.[/center]
[center]Fixed Dupe
Fixed bugs glitches
All Doors Working
Perfect Packet Handlers
Full Teleporting (not needed due to PK server)
All Magics (use some client with lunar…)
Following
Shops added
::Pickup and ::Master added
Yelling
Prayer
GS Stances
LagHandler
And thats pretty much it![/center]

[center]Like I said you can add on to it!
Pics will be added later on![/center]

Have fun!
